title: Hearty Chicken Soup with Horseradish Dumplings
ingredients: ['2 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 celery sticks, finely chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and finely chopped', '375g skinless, boneless chicken thighs, chopped', '120g self-raising flour', '60g light vegetable suet, shredded', '1 tbsp snipped fresh chives or parsley, plus extra to garnish', '1 tbsp grated horseradish from a jar', '500ml chicken stock, made with stock cubes', '125g frozen peas']
